attributes.action: Stop daylight saving and keep BST all year round
attributes.additional_details: Leave the time at BST so we can have some light in the evenkng after work.
attributes.background:
Changing the clocks is disruptive for everyone, adults, children, pets.
There is no need for the change anymore and the lack of evening light has negative health consequences.

rejection.details: You may wish to sign this petition which calls for the same action: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/642905
